# Unnamed local URLs are rejected as preferences

---

_Issue opened by @charliermarsh on 2024-05-24 13:55_

Given:

```
black @ ./scripts/packages/black_editable
```

```
❯ cargo run pip compile req.in -o requirements.txt
Resolved 1 package in 21ms
# This file was autogenerated by uv via the following command:
#    uv pip compile req.in -o requirements.txt
./scripts/packages/black_editable
    # via -r req.in

❯ cargo run pip compile req.in -o requirements.txt
    Finished `dev` profile [unoptimized + debuginfo] target(s) in 0.14s
     Running `target/debug/uv pip compile req.in -o requirements.txt`
error: direct URL requirements without package names are not supported: `file:///Users/crmarsh/workspace/uv/scripts/packages/black_editable`
```

I think we basically need to filter these out? I have to look at how pip-compile handles them.
